contentrichtext.text: '''Bridget''' may refer to: == People and fictional characters == *[[Bridget (given name)]] * Bridget, a giraffe character in the animated film [[The Wild]] *[[Bridget Forrester]], a fictional character in ''The Bold and the Beautiful''. *''[[Bridget Jones's Diary]]'', a novel and feature film starring RenÃ©e Zellweger. *[[Bridget (Guilty Gear)|Bridget]], a fictional character in the fighting game series ''Guilty Gear''. *Bridget Hennessey, the fictional eldest child on the sitcom ''[[8 Simple Rules]]''. *[[Bridget "Bee" Vreeland]], the fictional character of the book and movie ''The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants''. *[[An American Tail#Other Characters|Bridget]], an Irish activist and Tony's girlfriend, in ''An American Tail'' == Entertainment == *Bridget, Band *[[Bridget Marquardt]], from ''The Girls Next Door'' *[[Bridget Fonda]], actress *[[Bridget Moynahan]], actress and model *[[Bridget Mendler]], actress and singer == Other == *[[Bridget Rose Dugdale]], English heiress who joined the Provisional Irish Republican Army *Alternate spellings include: **[[Brigid]] or Brighid from [[Irish mythology]] **[[Saint Brigid of Ireland]] **[[Saint Birgitta of Sweden]] {{disambiguation}}
